items.question: The New England Confederation of 1643 was formed primarily because:
options: B) Defense against Native Americans and Dutch encroachment

items.question: The Enlightenment influenced the American Revolution by:
options: B) Emphasizing natural rights and social contract theory

options: B) United colonies in opposition to taxation without representation

items.question: The phrase "The Revolution was effected before the war commenced" means:
options: B) Ideological transformation preceded armed conflict

items.question: The Articles of Confederation failed primarily due to:
options: B) Inability to tax and regulate commerce effectively

options: B) Representation between large and small states

items.question: The Federalist Papers argued for:
options: B) Ratification through reasoned analysis of governmental structure

items.question: Anti-Federalists opposed the Constitution because:
options: B) It lacked a bill of rights and concentrated power

options: B) Counting slaves for representation and taxation

options: B) Federal authority to enforce tax law

options: B) It marked peaceful transfer of power between parties

options: B) Strict construction didn't explicitly allow territorial acquisition

options: B) Judicial review of legislative acts

options: B) New England Federalist opposition to War of 1812

options: B) Conflict between expansion and Native rights

options: B) Reform movements and democratization of religion

The Dred Scott decision intensified conflict by:

options: B) Applying only to rebellious states as war measure

options: B) Northern fatigue and Southern resistance

options: B) Ended federal protection of Black rights

options: B) Rapid growth alongside corruption and inequality
